category.name: Design
category.description: One of my hobbies is creating digital art & designs with various tools. This space got so much more accessible to more folks over the last couple of years and I hope to also spark some interest!

nodes.title: Introducing the Theme UI Plugin for Figma
nodes.description: The Theme UI plugin for Figma allows for a workflow where Theme UI is the starting point both for design & development.

nodes.title: 10 Tips for Photoshop Beginners
nodes.description: Some basic, but important principles that will help you create more enjoyable projects during and after the editing.
